Once the [app is started](A2_app_start.html) you see the graphical user interface 
(GUI) in your internet browser (here: Firefox) with the following four tab panels: 

-	[Explore](A3_1_gui_explore.html)

-	[Report](A3_2_gui_report.html)

-	[Background](A3_3_gui_background.html)

-	[Site](A3_4_gui_site.html)

The functionality of each tab panel is described in detail in the following 
sub-chapters.
